product_name: Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's
long_description: Stay comfortable during any activity in very cold weather with the men's Patagonia Capilene(R) 3 Midweight long underwear bottoms, a warm and highly breathable next-to-skin layer. The smooth exterior of Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) polyester slides easily under layers, and its brushed interior feels soft against skin, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays; high recycled content. Fabric treatment helps deter odors. Brushed waistband offers next-to-skin softness; medium rise hits just below the natural waist. Side seams are positioned a bit forward to create chafe-free comfort. The men's Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight long underwear bottoms feature a contoured, slim fit that won't restrict your movement. Gussted crotch; functional fly.
